protocols.content: Exclusion is required if a child has a fever of 100.4°F or greater (axillary/armpit) accompanied by behavior changes or other signs of illness. Children must be fever-free for 24 hours without the use of fever-reducing medication before returning.
protocols.operator_action: Strict exclusion. Do not admit child.

protocols.content: Children will only be released to persons listed on the enrollment form. In an emergency, if a parent cannot pick up the child, they must call 505-767-6500 to verbally authorize a temporary pickup person. Photo ID will be required.
protocols.operator_action: Verify ID. Call parents if unknown.

policies.content: Centers are closed on the following holidays: New Year's Day, Martin Luther King Jr. Day, Memorial Day, Independence Day, Labor Day, Veterans Day, Thanksgiving (and the day after), and Christmas Day (Dec 25).
policies.operator_action: Check current date against closure list.

policies.content: Our program is funded through Head Start, Early Head Start, and NM Pre-K grants. Eligibility is based on income and family needs. We do not have a standard tuition rate. Please contact an enrollment specialist at 505-767-6500 to determine your eligibility.
To schedule a tour of a Child Development Center, please call 505-767-6500. Tours are not currently bookable online.
We participate in the Child and Adult Care Food Program (CACFP). Breakfast, lunch, and an afternoon snack are provided to all children at no cost. Meals follow USDA nutrition guidelines.
